name: Hecahands Yadel
text: If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. You can only use each of the following effects of "Hecahands Yadel" once per turn. You can reveal this card in your hand; shuffle it into the Deck, then add 1 "Hecahands" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Hecahands" Spell/Trap in your GY; Set it.
